daily_tarot_screen.title: Daily Tarot Cards
daily_tarot_screen.placeholder_1: Before drawing a card, you need to calm down and ask yourself what do you want about today
daily_tarot_screen.placeholder_2:
The Ox is the second of all zodiac animals. According to one myth, the Jade Emperor said the order would be decided by the order in which they arrived to his party. The Ox was about to be the first to arrive, but Rat tricked Ox into giving him a ride. Then, just as they arrived, Rat jumped down and landed ahead of Ox. Thus, Ox became the second animal.
"Having an exceptional insight for detailed work, you prefer to keep your own counsel, listen to your intuition and rarely acts on unsolicited advice. You have a remarkable ability to heal from psychological as well as physical wounds.
